about_the_game:
Welcome to Meow Moments: Comic Cat Con, where the excitement of pop culture meets the charm of cats! In this hidden-objects game, explore a bustling convention filled with cats and characters cosplaying as your favorite superheroes, fantasy warriors, and sci-fi stars.

From comic books to movie magic, this DLC brings a world of geeky fun to life! Search through a colorful and energetic scene, packed with Easter eggs and nods to beloved fandoms. With no time limit, you can relax and enjoy the hunt, while popping balloons adds a satisfying twist.

Perfect for casual players and fans of pop culture alike, Comic Cat Con offers a fun and lighthearted experience, celebrating all things geeky!

By purchasing this DLC, you can:

  • Play a brand-new scene in the main game.

  • Add the Comic Cat Con content to your creations in the Community and Creative Maker. You can mix items from all the scenes you own in the same scene!

  • Play the scenes created by other players in the Community that include Comic Cat Con items.

You will also support us to create more content and more games!
Thanks in advance!

Welcome to Meow Moments: Comic Cat Con, where the excitement of pop culture meets the charm of cats! In this hidden-objects game, explore a bustling convention filled with cats and characters cosplaying as your favorite superheroes, fantasy warriors, and sci-fi stars.

From comic books to movie magic, this DLC brings a world of geeky fun to life! Search through a colorful and energetic scene, packed with Easter eggs and nods to beloved fandoms. With no time limit, you can relax and enjoy the hunt, while popping balloons adds a satisfying twist.

Perfect for casual players and fans of pop culture alike, Comic Cat Con offers a fun and lighthearted experience, celebrating all things geeky!

By purchasing this DLC, you can:

  • Play a brand-new scene in the main game.

  • Add the Comic Cat Con content to your creations in the Community and Creative Maker. You can mix items from all the scenes you own in the same scene!

  • Play the scenes created by other players in the Community that include Comic Cat Con items.

You will also support us to create more content and more games!
Thanks in advance!

short_description: Step into the world of Comic Cat Con! Find cats and characters dressed as iconic pop culture figures, from superheroes to sci-fi stars, in a vibrant celebration of geek culture.

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
